title: The BIG ONE, Literally
body_text:
The Writer has done it again.
Well-over 100 familiar faces and moments compiled into this magical musical showcase. From the casual fan to the weekly diehards, this is for you - thanks to all for making it possible.
Six of the game's biggest names carefully selected into this one gigantic encounter. The reason? Quite simple actually: each have never captured "the big one". But before such great detail is unveiled, let's find out just who will occupy the coveted spots at SEVEN: The Anniversary:
body_html:
The Writer has done it again.

Well-over 100 familiar faces and moments compiled into this magical musical showcase. From the casual fan to the weekly diehards, this is for you - thanks to all for making it possible.



Six of the game's biggest names carefully selected into this one gigantic encounter. The reason? Quite simple actually: each have never captured "the big one". But before such great detail is unveiled, let's find out just who will occupy the coveted spots at SEVEN: The Anniversary:
